Good luck only ever lasts so long. As a corsair, you’re no stranger to cutthroats and thieves, and you’re always waiting for the other boot to drop. 

Whenever you are Surprised, you can still choose to do one of the following on your first turn of combat:

  • Take an Action.
  • Move and take a Minor Action.
  • Gain temporary hit points equal to your level as a Non-Action.

You also learn the following Gambits: @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.abilities.YUAJX59ZHM417PCB]{Gambit: Shake a Leg}, @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.abilities.150EJLYVPMDY2VLI]{Gambit: Loose Cannon}
